name: Shattered Steel
description: Save your species as you engage in fast-paced mechanized combat in the single-player campaign containing 50 adrenaline-pounding missions and arm your Planet Runner with blazing firepower - over 25 armaments, including gatling guns, guided missiles, fuel-air mortars and plasma cannons.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Processor: 1.4 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9
